name: NFT Profile Picture for Twitter PC (SPS)
description:
Instructions

1/ Click on Duplicate.

2/ Modify the profile pic component to whatever you want (double-click on it and choose image)

3/ Click the Export artboard and export it.

4/ Set the exported png file as your profile picture on Twitter PC (On twitter.com, you can upload a transparent photo by clicking the ‚Üê Back button after selecting a photo instead of the Apply button).
